Reviews.Title: “Overcarges”
Reviews.Author: jerry5556
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night in a sub-par room.They have charged our Visa 4 times so far for one night.This has incurred 4 over draft charges plus trips to the bank trying to get things fixed.Well stay elsewhere next time.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing. NEW OWNERS”
Reviews.Author: TheHardTruth4567
Reviews.Content: The place has improved greatly. The Inn was cheap and definetly worth it. Part of the Restaurant is closed but the inn and restaurant and much cleaner and nicer, plus they have the easily one of the best burgers in Branson. The new owners just took over and they have plans for much more improvements as soon as possible. The inn also has new owners and has gotten much cleaner and comfortable. It's definetly the best for the money. For only 5.50 you can get an amazing half pound cheeseburger and 7.50 for special cheeseburger such as bacon. The pool goes from 3 feet to 10 feet deep.

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: tkirkes
Reviews.Content: Wow this place was cheap, but you get what you pay for. This place in is a great location right off the main road thru Branson. However, the rooms were dirty and smelled very musty. The beds were awful quality. We lost much sleep. Cleaning of the room consisted of making the bed and taking out the trash nothing else was done. The rooms were really run down. The bathroom was dirty and the bathtub had stains in it. I would pay a little more for a decent place to sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Had to re-think this motel”
Reviews.Author: rmr3599
Reviews.Content: I made reservations back in June and did as I was told if we wanted a certain room, call ahead early and they would reserve a particular room, no problem. We did this and I also called again in July to reconfirm our reservations. When we arrived the girls at the front desk had given our room away and put us in another room that I had to climb up stairs to. My wife found some pebbles in the bathroom floor and called house keeping to clean it up. In the mean time she sat in one of the chairs in the room and the bottom fell out. Again she called and they said the guy coming to clean the room would take care of it. He did come and go into the bathroom but wife said he didn't get all the pebbles up and he did bring another chair. The rooms are still a value but the folks running the desk are just not dependable anymore. If you have a handicap don't expect them to furnish you a room you requested that fits your needs.

Reviews.Title: “Good in Branson for the $$”
Reviews.Author: K4MRR
Reviews.Content: The motel seems to be built in the 60's so don't expect a modern room, but the king suite we stayed in was fine. It could have been updated, but for the price in Branson, it was fine. We were out on the town most of the time. The biggest "plus" at the motel is the staff who really try to please their guests. Fridges and microwaves were available on request (if available) and Randy, the manager, was super- he got us both for our room. They're not always available- and I carried the microwave from another unoccupied room- but we had both for our stay. Don't expect a Radisson or Mariott, but if you're looking for a reasonable place with a reasonable price, and nice folks as management, this is the place. I'd also recommend Chester's restaurant next door for breakfast. Two breakfasts with a lot of food, two coffees, and juice came to less than $20- which is the average price in Branson...

Reviews.Title: “I love this bar!!!”
Reviews.Author: hauntedbars
Reviews.Content: Great karaoke bar we had lots of fun !!! rumors that hillbilly inn is haunted made for a fun stay at the motel... you never know what you might see!!!

Reviews.Title: “Hillbilly Inn Good Value”
Reviews.Author: sanibeltravler
Reviews.Content: The Hillbilly Inn was a clean, affordable accommodation. The staff was super friendly and accommodating--quick to bring extra towels when we needed them. David at the front desk was very helpful in suggesting area shopping and other activities. We will return.

Reviews.Title: “Avoid the restaurant!”
Reviews.Author: insightceo
Reviews.Content: The restaurant is no longer providing the great food and service that it had become known for in Branson. Expect a long wait, poor service and low quality food.

Reviews.Title: “Love it!”
Reviews.Author: Greycie
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved it! The mangement is very friendly and very courteous. I love how the prices are cheap and the Inn is just fabulous. The view around the inn is amazingly beautiful.

Reviews.Title: “I have always loved the Hillbilly”
Reviews.Author: traverer101
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Hillbilly for about 15 years through the old owners and the new. I read the other reviews and think those reviews are a little on the " complaining about everything" side. I really enjoy our visits everytime we go. The entire staff at the motel and restaurant are very friendly, the rooms are clean and the food is great. If you you want a clean, friendly enviroment that caters families every size do not take my word for it. Try this motel out.

Reviews.Title: “I wish I'd slept in my car instead!”
Reviews.Author: jutoou
Reviews.Content: What can't be said about this dismal place! It was in a bad section of the 76 strip, the rooms were unclean and my tv didn't work well. When I arrived after my long car drive, there was no one in the lobby and I had to search out somebody who could check me in, finally finding a rather rude young lady in the bar lounge where, while I was there, seemed to offer the worst karaoke show I've ever seen, as the girl that hosted the show was doing a lousy job! When I was finally given a key, I regreted the effort! This was a run down dump and I'll never go back! Also, they advertised the so called "best breakfast in Branson" which we soon found to be a joke! Worst food I've ever sat down to! My advice..Stay Hillbilly CLEAR!

Reviews.Title: “Fun , Family Place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We also Stayed at the Hillbilly Inn in Branson , Mo. in May of 2006 and found the rooms to be very sastisfactory. The prices were right and the room was nice and clean. The parking wasnt bad either. The restaurant & Lounge were both excellant. I enjoyed karoke and the breakfast was good down home country cooking. Our room was very nice and most definately clean otherwise i sure wouldnt of stayed. We did not meet management but staff was very nice and friendly. We had a great time and willdefinately stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Dirty and broken down”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The rooms were cheap, but you get what you pay for. The rooms had a terrible musty smell when we arrived. The toilet in the kids room said it was sanitized, but when they lifted the lid there was urine all over the seat. The bathtub in our room had a ring around it. We bought air freshner and Clorox and had to clean the rooms to feel safe. The workout equipment was all broken - every single one. The ATM machine was also broken. The restaraunt advertises the best breakfast in Branson. The food was good, but the service was very slow. We were in the older looking part of the hotel beside the playground. If they put you there turn around and leave. The only good thing about the hotel was the price. But I'll never stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “It was ok but I was very impressed”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: It was ok not anything great but I guess you get what you pay for. The rooms were not very big they were not the cleaniest rooms I've seen. The restaurant I didn't like at all. The food was cold and the entertainment was lousy. We are going back to Branson again but we wont go there.

Reviews.Title: “Hillbilly Inn, A great place if you're on a budget!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hillbilly Inn in Sept. of 2003 and were not dissappointed in any way. We had a group of 5 adults and 1 child and stayed in the family suite. The motel is not fancy but very clean and comfortable and the rates are great for a family or group on a budget. The kareoke lounge was also very nice. We didn't eat at the restaurant but my parents have and say it is wonderful. We go to Branson 2 or 3 times a year and will definatly stay at the Hillbilly Inn again.

HotelInfo.Name: Hillbilly Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 1166 West Hwy. 76, Branson, MO 65616
